topic.topicTitle: Creating a Student or Teacher Account
topic.topicDialog:
We recommend that the Create New Account function is only used for creating individual Teacher accounts, or when you need to add an extra Student to Kerboodle.

We wouldn't recommend this option for organisations that are likely to be importing multiple Students and Teachers in the future, so if you're unsure, please speak to your data manager or technician about taking on the import process.

For more information about importing multiple accounts to Kerboodle, please have a look at the Importing Multiple Accounts tutorial.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, click on the Switch to Admin mode button at the top of the page and re-enter your password to enter the Admin area.
Click on the Create New Account button.
Complete the required fields within the pop-up.
The new account will then appear in the Students / Teachers list.
